bookmarks.message:
Opens a webpage on hotkey press in the in-game browser.

Try the hotkey below to open poe.ninja.
bookmarks.title: Bookmarks

changelog-1-0-11.message:
- added heist item data & stats
- added heist item properties at the evaluate dialog
- added heist item types at the market
- added heist filter group at the market
- updated the external link behavior to skip in game notification
- fixed an issue causing values at the evaluate dialog to be cut off (#827, #829)
- fixed an issue freezing the launcher (#826)
- fixed an issue with too long stats at the market window (#814)
- fixed an issue using the slider at the settings window (#815)
changelog-1-0-11.title: What's new in 1.0.11?

commands.message:
All game commands can be bound to hotkeys.

There are also placeholders like @char available which will be replaced before executing the command.

Try the hotkey below to teleport into your hideout.
commands.title: Commands

close.message: The window can be closed by clicking outside the window or by pressing esc if the window was focused.
close.title: Close evaluate window

evaluate.message:
Lets you evaluate items with your given presets of search filters.

Hover over an item and press the hotkey below:

options.message:
The options can be toggled by clicking the highlighted icon.

They are used to quick adjust certain settings like the league for this search.

The values are changeable by scrolling.
options.title: Options

price.message: The price section either shows the exchange rate from poe.ninja or for rare items the predicted price from poeprices.info.
price.title: Price

properties.message:
The properties includes the calculate DPS.

They are normalized exactly to 20% quality - regardless if the actual quality is higher/ or lower.
This can be turned off in the settings.

Clicking on a property adds it to the search query. More onto this at the stats.
properties.title: Properties

search.message:
The search shows all listings based on your filters.

You can choose between a graphical or a list view.
The graph view groups the items based on their price and displays the count of those groups. The list view simply shows the listing sorted by the amount.
Both views are additionally filtered for potential price fixers by grouping their listing into one.

By clicking a listing - a formatted price note will be copied to your clipboard.
search.title: Search

settings.message:
The settings can be adjusted by clicking the highlighted icon. Most settings are defining what item properties are added onto the initial search.

For example you can adjust the pre-selected stats in the settings.
settings.title: Settings

stats.message:
Clicking a stat will add it to the search query.

You can modify the range by scrolling while hovered. If you want to adjust a single value - just hover it.
By holding ALT you can adjust the step size to 0.1 and to 5 by holding SHIFT.

To set a value to infinite you right click it.
To reset a value you wheel click it.
stats.title: Stats

evaluate.title: Evaluate

close.message: The window can be closed by clicking outside the window or by pressing esc if the window was focused.
close.title: Close inspect window

loot.message: Shows the possible loot of a map or the loot location for a given item.
loot.title: Loot

inspect.message:
Allows you to open the item at the wiki or poe.db. Also shows the dangerous stats of a given map or the drop location for certain divination cards. 

Hover over an item and press the hotkey below:

settings.message:
The settings can be adjusted by clicking the highlighted icon.

For example you can adjust the map stat warnings in the settings.
settings.title: Settings

inspect.title: Inspect

urls.message: Open item in the official wiki or poe.db by clicking one of the highlighted icons.
urls.title: Urls

close.message: The market will keep the current results. Can be closed by pressing the hotkey again or clicking the x at the top right.
close.title: Close market

filter.message: Click the highlighted icon to open the filter. Adjust the values to your like.
filter.title: Filter

market.message:
The market allows you to browse listed items and exchange currencies within the game. 

Can be toggled by pressing the hotkey below:

reset.message: The filter can be reset by clicking the highlighted symbol.
reset.title: Reset filter

search.message:
The search shows the filtered results. It will automatically fetch new items once you reach the end of the list.

By clicking the send button you'll send a whisper with your offer.
search.title: Search

market.title: Market

misc.message:
The stash highlight feature lets you filter the stash for given item.

Open your stash and press the hotkey below while hovering a item.
misc.title: Misc

replay.message:
Captures short videos of game events like your death or if you kill a significant boss.

Can be enabled at the settings. This is disabled by default because it may reduce your FPS.
replay.title: Replay

app-settings.message: The app language can be adjusted as you like.
app-settings.title: App settings

close.message: All settings are applied directly. The window can be closed by pressing the same hotkey again.
close.title: Close settings

game-settings.message:
The game language must match your client language.
The league should be the same as your current character.

Also keep in mind once a new league arrives you need to adjust your settings accordingly.
game-settings.title: Game settings

settings.message: Open the settings window by pressing following hotkey:
settings.title: Settings

support.message:
Do you have a question? Or do you want to request a new feature?

Check the support tab at the settings menu for further information.

Also if you love the app, consider supporting me by subscribing.
support.title: Support

thanks.message:
That's it for now. Hope you enjoy my app. 

- Best regards, Kyusung4698
thanks.title: Thank you!

highlight.message:
To find the requested item in your stash you can click the highlighted icon.

At the top you can see the stash tab name. The icon on the right lets you switch between a normal and a quad stash layout.

You can filter the stash by clicking on the names at the bottom.
highlight.title: Highlight items

incoming.message: By clicking on the upper part of a message the action bar will be revealed. If you're at your hideout it'll be revealed automatically.
incoming.title: Incoming messages

init.message:
The trade module provides a UI for incoming and outgoing trade messages.

You can invite the player, initiate the trade and highlight the item in the stash.
init.title: Trade

outgoing.message: These are marked by a different color. The action bar is always revealed.
outgoing.title: Outgoing Messages

settings.message: In the settings you can customize the send messages and also disable the UI.
settings.title: Settings

welcome.message: The following annotations will guide you through the basic functionality.
welcome.title: Welcome to PoE Overlay!

clipboard.error: An error occurred while parsing the item.
clipboard.parser-error: Item could not be parsed. Please make sure you have the correct language selected.

commands.execute-error: An unexpected error occurred while executing the command.
commands.name: Commands

errors.http:
Could not communicate with poeprices.info
Please make sure the website is reachable.

prediction.language: poeprices.info only supports English as client language.

errors.http:
Could not communicate with poe.ninja
Please make sure the website is reachable.

tag.exact: Exact price has been copied. Double tap for negotiable price.

event.start-error: Could not start listening to game events.

help.browser: Holding CTRL while clicking will open the link in the default browser.
help.browser-title: How do i open the search in my default browser?
help.bug-title: Found a Bug? Or have a Suggestion? Please create an issue on GitHub
help.donate-title: Love the project? Feel free to leave a donation. Thanks for your support!
help.dwm:
This is mostly caused by an disabled Aero / DWM. Therefore try enabling this windows feature.
As it's required to create transparent windows.
help.dwm-title: Why is my screen turning black/white after toggling any feature?
help.graph:
The bar indicates the distribution of the item value. It basically groups the values by value and counts them.
The highest bar is the Mode. Also named 'most common value'. Mean is the average. Median is the centered value of all values.
help.graph-title: What does the graph represent? What is mode/mean/median?
help.graph-url: Open 'How to read a Histogram Min Max Median Mean' by 'academy.datawrapper.de'
help.graphic:
This is mostly caused by incompatible graphic drivers for the current chromium version.
Please disable Hardware Acceleration inside the tray menu.
help.graphic-title: The graphics are blurry/ graphic bug?
help.name: Help
help.wiki-title: See the project wiki for further documentation

map.boss-rating-info:
5: High and consistent damage output that is difficult to reliably avoid; skipped by many players.
4: High and consistent damage output that can be avoided reasonably well but still very dangerous.
3: Occasionally high damage output that can be avoided reasonably well.
2: Moderate damage output that can be easily kited and/or reasonably mitigated by most builds.
1: Trivial for most builds.
map.layout-rating-info:
A: The map has a consistent layout that can be reliably fully cleared with no backtracking.
B: The map has an open layout with few obstacles, or has only short and well-connected side paths.
C: The map has an open layout with many obstacles, or has long side paths that require backtracking.
map.name: Map

replay.capture-error: The event could not be captured.
replay.help:
Replays are saved at: '{{path}}'
Old videos are deleted after reaching a size threshold.
replay.name: Replay
replay.start-error: The events capturing could not be started.
replay.started: The capture of events has been started.
replay.stop-error: The events capturing could not be stopped.
replay.stopped: The capture of events has been stopped.

developer.title: Support the Developer

question.text: You have a question? Or do you want to request a new feature?
question.title: Get Support
